resources:
Sb Weather Settings We are the Sunshine Boys, and we are making an app to facilitate an easier, user friendly use and logging of temperature and other ambient sensors. It consists of a mobile app that makes use of sensors connected to the phone to log and display the values returned by sensors. The application also supports sending these values to a remote server, as well as the history of readings, logged and viewable at the users discretion. This app is free, as you also have to purchase the hardware addon to use the app, which contains the required sensors to utilize the app properly. Forget Password? No account? Create one! Sign In Password Email Name Reset Password Register Already have an account?
